text: Parenting education programs have been shown to have numerous benefits for both parents and children. Research indicates that parents who participate in such programs are more likely to use positive discipline strategies, have better communication with their children, and provide a nurturing and supportive environment at home. These factors have been linked to improved child behavior, academic performance, and overall well-being.
